about_the_game:
Restauration Furniture is an engaging and educational video game that combines the thrill of restoration furniture.
In this unique and creative game, players take on the role of a skilled furniture restorer and decorator.
Their mission is to breathe new life into worn and antique furniture pieces, transforming them into stunningnew furniture.
Set in a workshop, the game offers a rich and immersive experience that encourages players to unleash their creativity while learning about the history and art of furniture restoration.

Key Features:

Restoration Challenges: Players will be presented with a wide array of antique and worn-out furniture pieces, each with its own set of challenges. These pieces may include vintage chairs, tables, cabinets, and more.
Your task is to restore them to their former glory.

Tools and Techniques: Restauration Furniture features a variety of realistic restoration tools and techniques, including sanding, painting, and woodworking. Each tool and process is faithfully restoration experience.

Charming Workshop: The game is set in a well-equipped restoration workshop filled with tools, materials.
The workshop serves as the player's base for all restoration and design activities.

Customization: As you progress through the game, you can customize your workshop and tools to reflect your unique style and preferences. Personalize your virtual workspace to enhance the overall gaming experience.
